channel.title: books on Website of David Lee
channel.description: Recent content in books on Website of David Lee

item.title: Lessons of Leadership from South: The Endurance
item.description: TLDR: On their way to Antarctica, Shackleton and his men are forced to abandon ship and survive in a treacherous environment. Despite significant obstacles, Shackleton leads his men to safety thanks to his preparation, adaptability, and intuitive understanding of human psychology.

item.title: My Favorite Books of 2018
item.description: TLDR: My top favorite books of 2018 and everything else I read.
